page.title: 15EVENTS IN CAREW AREA,TENBY.
page.content: { Every year there is a 'Behind the {Battlements' production at Carew {Castle.}This is produced by Pembroke_ shire Coast National Park. It is a {theatrical interpretation of life in {the castle in a chosen era. 1985's production was set in Tudor times. Once they had put on costumes provided,visitors found themselves in a Tudor market.They were guided through the castle by servants, entertained by musicians and they took part in a Tudor meal. Last year's production won a'Carnegie Interpret Britain Award'.It was then set in 1300 A.D. The first ever{Welsh Medieval Archery {Championships}will be held at Carew Castle in August 1985. Tenby Lions stage an annual{Summer {Spectacular}in Carew with special displays.
